    public abstract class TrianaTool
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements TrianaColorConstants
    The graphical representation of a tool.

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics graphs)
        Paints the Triana Tool by rendering its name in the middle of the icon. Note that the size of the icon is not determined until this class is extended to produce a ToolImp, ToolBox or a TrianaTool.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
